overview:
Ed Chow is the founder and CEO of Offer Clouds, a Hong Kong-based start-up developing a location-based service (LBS) platform for the “On4Off” (Online advertising for Offline offers) advertising markets worldwide.

With a Bachelorâ€™s degree in Electrical Engineering with Computer Engineering, and a Master of Engineering in Software Engineering, he has worked as software developer and manager in Canada and Hong Kong, and translated consumption-centric ideas into patentable technologies.
